headline: Expeditors Appoints David A. Hackett as CFO
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., August 06, 2025--Expeditors International of Washington, Inc. (NYSE: EXPD) announced the appointment of David A. Hackett on August 4, 2025, as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective October 1, 2025. Hackett has served as Vice President, Finance, since May 2024. On August 4, 2025, Expeditors’ current Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Bradley S. Powell, notified the Board of Directors of his intention to retire, effective September 30, 2025.
